title: UnBayleefable is a scripter kthx
body: scrub scripter silver elo get good kid.

replies.body:
I'm sure this post made you feel just peachy but next time use this instead.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/vJxZ1wI.png[/img]
Just play Annie she's immune to scripters.

Riot doesn't care about scripters, and you would be surprised at how many there are around plat 1 level. I joined a ranked team the other day only to find out all of them are scripters. Honestly it doesn't matter, scripts don't win you games, which is why they are all stuck around this elo.
nothing about reporting a player on there is there. fucking doubt riot will do anything about it anyway.
